import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../Rating' import products from '../../products' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const selectedProduct = products.filter(({_id}) => _id === match.params.id); const {image, name, rating, numReviews, price} = selectedProduct[0]; console.log(match.params.id); return ( //

{match.params.id}

{name}
${price} ) } export default ProductScreen
